Radio: The news can still be heard on the radio. There are many news channels that broadcast live news updates throughout the day.
Online News: With television news sources, news can still be accessed online. News websites, blogs, and social media platforms are all great sources of breaking news.
News Apps: There are many news apps available that deliver breaking news alerts and updates in real-time.
Mobile News: Mobile news is a great way to keep up with the news on-the-go. News apps and websites are optimized for mobile devices and can be accessed from anywhere.

Community News: Community news sources such as newspapers, magazines, and local news websites can also provide a comprehensive view of the news. These sources often focus on local events and issues, and can provide a more personal perspective on the news.
